Acceptance Criteria - NDM testing to be carried out by IANZ accredited laboratory. Site plan to be provided to Engineer showing every test point. Minimum acceptable result shall be 95% of the suppliers specification as per approved JMF.

Frequency - 10m intervals with surveyed test point locations
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - NDM Compaction Testing

Acceptance Criteria -Deflection testing shall be carried prior to kerb and channel being formed.

Acceptance Criteria - In accordance with NZS 3109. Finished level of formwork shall be within +-10mm of design. The line of the formwork shall be straight with the maximum deviation from a 3m straight edge along the face of 5mm with a cumulative total of all visible gaps of not more than 10mm.
Frequency - Prior to pouring the concrete
